headline.main: FIRST LADY URGES DRIVE ON WASTE; Holds Conservation Necessary in All Phases of Living Now and After the War

lead_paragraph: Elimination of wastefulness In every phase of living from home management to the world-wide distribution of raw materials, was set yesterday by Mrs. Franklin D. Roosevelt as one of the goals for which the American people should strive both at present and in the post-war reconstruction period.
abstract: Mrs Roosevelt on need for econ maldistribution rectification in peace settlement
